actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide an opportunity to individuals to contribute $1, in connection with the payment of their Federal income tax, to the U.S. Olympic Fund.

summary.text: United States Olympic Fund Act - Establishes on the books of the Treasury a Fund to be known as the "United States Olympic Fund." Allows an individual taxpayer to designate that one dollar of any overpayment of his tax, or one dollar of any contribution which he makes with his return be available to such fund. Authorizes to be appropriated to the fund an amount equal to twice the amounts designated by taxpayers pursuant to this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide an opportunity to individuals to contribute $1, in connection with the payment of their Federal income tax, to the U.S. Olympic Fund.
